TopicTitle: WheelCollider requires an attached Rigidbody to function, and a couple other loading errors

Articles.Content:
Stock, fresh install of 1.0.4 on Lubuntu 15.04 64bit, and I am getting a bunch of wheel collider errors along with a couple other issues.

IIRC, it seems to me I've been getting wheel collider errs for every stock, as well as every mod part ever installed (that has to do with wheels or landing), for every version of KSP since 0.90...both Win & Linux vers... ???

Here's the relevant lines from my KSP.log:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0D_PFGuuyqoN1UyZ0ZMbGsxSDQ/view?usp=sharing

Yes, this error has been around for a while. However, it doesn't cause any play issues. Plus this will likely go away when 1.1 comes out, since wheels are receiving an overhaul due to the migration to Unity 5.

Cheers,

-Claw
